item.title: Russia cuts interest rate to 17% as wartime economy slows while deficit grows
item.description: Russia’s central bank is cutting its benchmark interest rate by one percentage point to 17%, a step that could support growth and business activity as...

item.title: Microsoft resolves European Union probe into Teams
item.description: European Union regulators have accepted Microsoft's proposed changes to its Teams app to resolve an antitrust investigation

item.title: The late fashion designer Giorgio Armani instructs heirs to sell 15% of his empire
item.description: The late Italian designer Giorgio Armani instructed his heirs to sell a 15% stake in his fashion empire

item.title: Lebanon licenses Elon Musk's Starlink for satellite internet services
item.description: Lebanon has granted a license to Elon Musk’s Starlink to provide satellite internet services in the country

item.title: South Korean workers released after days of detention in Georgia return home
item.description: A plane carrying more than 300 South Korean workers released after days of detention in Georgia has landed in South Korea
